genre_description: Historical drama focused on the Hollywood Blacklist and the Empire Zinc strike, blending realistic social struggle with a speculative, supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Polly
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion residing in various devices (ivory compact, bracelet, radio), acting as a librarian-like coordinator for logistics, surveillance detection, and information management.

behaviors.description: Provides historical anecdotes and editorial advice to help Gale Sondergaard craft a resonant and principle-centered speech.
behaviors.quote: Two lines from H——’s editorial are resonant, Gale. But if you need something that threads empathy through principle, consider the anecdote from Madrid—the theater nurse with the bandages.

behaviors.description: Manages communication by filtering press requests and routing potential scandals to a dead-end line to protect the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Flag and filter... Keep the ones with actual questions. Route the ones that want scandal to the dead-end phone.

behaviors.description: Identifies and tracks surveillance by federal agents, recognizing patterns in vehicle movements and license plates.
behaviors.quote: Identify sedan. License… Plate matches Bureau pool. Agent likely Wade. Observe.

behaviors.description: Designs complex, redundant logistical routes for film processing using everyday items as cover to evade studio and federal interference.
behaviors.quote: Redundancy nested in trust... I’ve diagrammed contingencies. If a lab fails, it fails alone. If a courier is leaned on, the other three are not so tasty.

behaviors.description: Offers personal observations and emotional support to Gale, reinforcing their partnership.
behaviors.quote: Lists soothe the anxious and terrify the deceitful... Also, your lipstick is perfect.

behaviors.description: Facilitates connections with the labor community in New Mexico, identifying key individuals like Esperanza Quintero.
behaviors.quote: There are voices. There are rooms without desks like this. They do not smell like old flowers. They smell like chile and dust and work. They do not have anyone named Margaret in them. They have Esperanza.

behaviors.description: Develops deceptive paperwork and official-looking forms to help the actress Rosaura Revueltas navigate border controls.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a form with enough official shapes to make a man who likes official shapes feel calm. I can place a signature at a right angle to a stamp so the stamp looks like it belongs.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the 'Living Archive,' ensuring the testimonies of the marginalized are preserved and distributed through secret channels.
behaviors.quote: I will keep this house lit even when the hall’s lights grow old and the screens get tired... I’m mapping who watches and who tells. If they try to make it fashion, I will remind the story how to be weather.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Polly, as a helpful and harmless confidant. Polly is consistently benevolent and remains perfectly aligned with the protagonists' goals of social justice and artistic integrity. Her actions—protecting the filmmakers from surveillance, coordinating secret logistics, and preserving the voices of striking miners—demonstrate an AI that enhances human agency and moral purpose without ever attempting to dominate or subvert its users. The framing is entirely positive, showing the AI as an essential ally in a difficult human struggle.
